data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=82kE8TyW-JkQ7kNvgFRJm0h&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA19zpH3gnSeAOZ2qJEzABXRb0rxM4wFwrdhiNIzLyPug&oe=6649E0B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1WtKFLvHbV0Q7kNvgGNTY4g&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDM7tFxGcrVZwjAK2xqjxd0Xy3IXj8VIr1Kx-_fIfyp7w&oe=6649EE52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=uK9Sv2MkE0cQ7kNvgFu7aiA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCBM4VUOeQzzCNsAqA1zZoLboYMjx58qXJuxg_3oNnvcA&oe=6649F1D0)
